Posts.Content: WELL IT IS 15 DAYS SINCE I HAD MY FIRST DOSE OF CHEMO AND ON THE 13TH DAY MY HAIR DID START TO FALL OUT, AND TODAY IT WAS REALLY COMING OUT, I AM NOT SURE WHAT TO DO, KEEP IT HOW IT IS OR REALLY CUT IT DOWN,SHAVE IT? I FEEL SOOOOO SILLY ABOUT THE WHOLE HAIR SITUATION , I DID CUT MY HAIR BEFORE I STARTED CHEMO(ABOUT 15 INCHES OR SO) I STILL HAVE "BOB" HAIRCUT AND MY HAIR IS SO THICK,CURLY ?AND HEAVY ....I JUST DONT KNOW. ANY SUGGESTIONS???
Posts.Title: what tot do now???

Posts.Content: LAST FRIDAY I FOUND OUT I HAD BREAST CANCER,WHAT A SHOCKER! I AM 32 MARRIED FOR 15 YEARS AND HAVE TWO BEAUTIFUL GIRLS. I AM NOT SURE WHAT TO EXPECT,ON MONDAY THE 27TH OF JUNE I HAVE AN APPT W/A SURGEON.IKNOW MY LYPMH NODES ARE OK IT IS JUST THE LUMP THAT TESTED + FOR CANCER. ANY INFO WHAT TO EXPECT FROM NOW ON?
Posts.Title: NEW TO BREAST CANCER

Posts.Content: WELL AFTER HAVING MY LUMPECTOMY I AM KNOW GOING TO START CHEMO. DOES ANYONE HAVE INFO ON HOW FAST I WILL LOSE MY HAIR?OR IN WHAT STAGE? THE FOLLOWING IS WHAT MY DR HAS RECOMMENDED CYTOXAN,ADRIAMYCIN,TAXOL, ANY INFO WILL BE GRATLY APPRECIATED
Posts.Title: FIRST DOSE OF CHEMO
